Diploma in Computer Engineering

Maharashtra State Board of Education- 
• Percentage: 67.41% 
Profile 
Enthusiastic and detail-oriented Computer Engineering graduate with a strong foundation in object-oriented 
programming, database management systems, and software development. Proficient in C# and MS SQL, with hands-
on experience building desktop-based applications like a Salon Management System, showcasing the ability to design 
efficient user interfaces and manage backend data operations. Quick learner with excellent problem-solving skills, 
passionate about building scalable software solutions and contributing to collaborative tech environments 
Projects 
Face and Iris Based Attendance System 
 
Designed and developed a desktop-based application in Python to automate attendance tracking using facial and iris 
recognition. The system employs advanced image processing and machine learning algorithms for precise 
identification and verification. Features include real-time data capture, secure storage, and detailed reporting. This 
project showcases expertise in Python programming, computer vision (OpenCV), and biometric authentication 
systems, providing a reliable and efficient solution for attendance management. 
Salon Management System  
Developed a desktop-based application in C# to streamline salon operations, including customer management, 
appointment scheduling, service tracking, and billing. 
 
Implemented object-oriented programming principles for modular and maintainable code. 
 
Designed a user-friendly GUI using Windows Forms for intuitive navigation. 
 
Utilized MS SQL for robust backend support with features like data normalization, indexing, and stored 
procedures. 
Technologies 
Languages: Java, C#, SQL, Python 
Technologies: .NET, Microsoft SQL Server 
Certificates 
 
• Internshala Programming with Python 
• Internshala Advance Excel 
• Deloitte CyberSecurity 
• Deloitte Technology
